Key Match Events: Luka Doncic scored 27 points and had 13 assists
Daniel Gafford scored 17 points playing a season-high 24 minutes
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls played without leading scorer Zach LaVine
Dallas played without starting forward P.J. Washington and Dereck Lively II
Others: The Mavericks scored the first 13 points of the second half and led by as many as 30
The Bulls were on pace for their most 3-point shots this season at halftime but shooting 18.5%
The Mavericks held their own inside, outscoring the Bulls 60-48 in the paint and standing even on second-chance points 12-12
Dallas led in points off turnovers 28-13
